PHRASE.LANG: Almost everyone has a mobile phone these days, but not everyone has diamonds on theirs. Lucky you! [#Legal]
Pratiquement tout le monde a un téléphone portable de nos jours, mais combien en ont un orné de diamants ? Chanceuse. [#Legal]
Heute hat ja fast jeder ein Handy, aber nicht jeder hat eins mit Diamanten. [#Legal]
Oggi quasi tutti possiedono un cellulare, ma pochi ne hanno uno con diamanti. Beata te! [#Legal]
Hoy en día casi todos tienen móvil, pero no muchos lo tienen de diamantes. ¡Afortunada! [#Legal]
누구나 휴대전화를 가지고 있지만, 다이아몬드로 장식된 휴대전화는 별로 없습니다. [#Legal]
Almost everyone has a cell phone these days, but not everyone has diamonds on their cell phone. Lucky you! [#Legal]
今時今日，人人也有手機，鑽石手機卻非人人擁有。你真幸運！[#Legal]
今時今日，人人也有手機，鑽石手機卻非人人擁有。你真幸運！[#Legal]
Almost everyone has a cell phone these days, but not everyone has diamonds on their cell phone. Lucky you! [#Legal]
